tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE article_interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  article_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(1)
);

CREATE TABLE Articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    publish_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    article_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE article_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    article_id INT,
    interaction_type TEXT,
    interaction_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE articles ( article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, content TEXT, author_id UUID, created_at TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE interactions ( interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID, article_id UUID, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), timestamp TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE ratings ( rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID, article_id UUID, rating FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE recommendations ( recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID, recommended_article_id UUID, score FLOAT );
